description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows SmartScreen security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-21351):

1. Download the appropriate KB update package for your Windows version from the links below.
2. Install the update package by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Restart your system once the installation is complete to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates available are KB5034763 for Windows 10 Version 22H2, KB5034765 for Windows 11 Versions, and KB5034774 for Windows 10.
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
  - [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
  - [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
  - [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to the supported Windows version listed above.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
